example.name: ornament-fturn
example.description: Example of multiple finger numbers attached to an ornament (turn). From Beethoven's piano sonata no. 8 in C minor, op. 13, mvmt. 2: Adagio cantabile.

file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.description: SCORE file used to create example
